ovdesc.p: This template is used to capture the transaction information of Teller which is again used to print on a deal slip.

desc.p: It will be Valid Teller Transaction @id.
This field is used to indicate whether there is any large deposit done.
This field is used to indicate whether the Account used for transaction is New account or not.
This field is used to indicate whether the Account used for transaction is Repeated overdraft or not.
This field will be set as YES when the default condition of the parameter table USREGS.REGULATION.PARAM is applied.
This field is used to intimate that how much amount is released immediately.
This field is used to indicate that how much amount is released when the transaction is done.
This field will have the date on which the transaction is done.
The field is used to indicate that how much amount will be kept on hold.
This field will indicate the date that when the hold amount will get released.
This field is used to intimate the user that how much amount is next available to the customer.
